item.description:
We have been looking at different practices within the Native community. This month, Stone Holder of the Abenaki tribe will teach us the correct way to make and use a medicine bag as practiced in his tradition. All supplies will be available.

Stone Holder is a patient teacher and I know you will learn much from him about not only making the medicine bag, but also about the traditions associated with it.

So bring enough food to feed at least four people and be ready to have a great time, good food and wonderful conversations!

Do not be worried about the number of RSVP's as a number of people also attend who are not a member of this meetup!

Also, we are on Facebook now. Just search for A Place of Light and join us in our weekly exercises and sharing of experiences!


dance in the light!

Susan
item.name: Making a Medicine Bag
